Energized_Shield.help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Energized_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Energized_Shield.attackerHit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Push_Back.help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Slice.help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Whirling_Sword.help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Sword.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Hack.help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hack.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Spear.help: You throw a pilum at a foe, dealing heavy damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Resistance.help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.
Resistance.shortHelp: Self Auto, Res(All), Res Sleep, Fear
Resistance.targetHelp: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Self Auto, Res(All), Res Sleep, Fear
